zhoneShelfMonitorModule.name: zhoneShelfMonitorModule

revisions.description: Add shelf I/O alarm board present
V01.01.15 - Update shelfCardStatus with new card states (15, 16) for concurrent uplink. Also added missing states.
V01.01.14 - Added Battery A, B and Battery return voltages. - Added shelfFanTrayType
V01.01.13 - Added fan C/D/E status. - Added missing power C/D status .
V01.01.12 - Added power supply C status
Added NotProvisioned State to cardState Added FanTrayOK type to shelfTrap list

Moved shelfDataTable from 3.2.4 to 3.2.1 Renamed shelfEnvironTable to shelfStatusTable and moved from 3.2.5 to 3.2.2 Added shelfFanTable, shelfTemperatureTable, and shelfCardTable Moved zhoneStatusChangeGroup
V01.01.05 - Added markup for environmental status fields.

V01.01.04 - Added tempOverLimit, tempUnderLimit, tempNormal, fanPowerSupplyAFailure, fanPowerSupplyAOK, fanPowerSupplyBFailure, fanPowerSupplyBOK, fanTrayAdded, and fanTrayRemoved to the zhoneShelfStatus OID.
V01.01.03 - Added the cardReset and cardRunning to the zhoneCardStatus Object Type.
V01.01.02 - Added Revision descriptions to this mib.
V01.01.01 - Added the shelfControllerFault to the zhoneShelfStatus Object Type. Added the cardFaultError to the zhoneCardStatus Object Type.

V01.01.00 - Added zhoneShelfStatus Object Type. Added zhoneCardStatus Object Type. Added zhoneShelfStatusLastChange Object Type. Added zhoneCardStatusLastChange Object Type. Imported TimeStamp from rfc1907.mib All changes for the shelfCtrl task.

zhoneShelfMonitorModule.contactinfo: Postal: Zhone Technologies, Inc. @ Zhone Way 7001 Oakport Street Oakland, CA 94621 USA Toll-Free: +1 877-ZHONE20 (+1 877-946-6320) Tel: +1-510-777-7000 Fax: +1-510-777-7001 E-mail: support@zhone.com
zhoneShelfMonitorModule.description: Contains the elements that are monitored on a per shelf basis in the PLS.

shelfDataTable.name: shelfDataTable
shelfDataTable.description: A table of shelf information and status for each shelf in a PLS system. The table includes revision level, general shelf status, and enviromental monitoring. The maximum number of shelves in a system is 255. Shelf 0 is an invalid entry.

shelfDataEntry.name: shelfDataEntry
shelfDataEntry.description: An entry per shelf in a PLS system. The entries are indexed by zhoneShelfIndex or the shelf number which has a value of 1 to 255. Shelf 0 is not valid. zhoneShelfIndex is a column in the zhoneShelfSlotTable, defined in the zhone MIB (Zhone.mib). An Entry in the table is automatically created when a new shelf is added to a PLS and detected by the operating software of the system

shelfMfgCLEICode.name: shelfMfgCLEICode
shelfMfgCLEICode.description: CLEI (Common Language Equipment Identifier) code of the shelf assembly as stored in the EEPROM of the unit if defined otherwise the value will be set to NULL (0-length string) by the shelf monitor card. Note: CLEI codes for individual assemblies of the shelf such as monitor card or backplane assembly are not supported.

shelfMonitorSerialNumber.name: shelfMonitorSerialNumber
shelfMonitorSerialNumber.description: The manufacturing serial number for the shelf monitor card of this shelf assembly.

shelfMonitorRevisionCode.name: shelfMonitorRevisionCode
shelfMonitorRevisionCode.description: Manufacturing hardware revision code for the shelf monitoring card of this shelf assembly

shelfBkplaneSerialNumber.name: shelfBkplaneSerialNumber
shelfBkplaneSerialNumber.description: The manufacturing serial number of the backplane in this shelf assembly.

shelfBkplaneRevisionCode.name: shelfBkplaneRevisionCode
shelfBkplaneRevisionCode.description: The manufacturing hardware revision code for the back- plane in this shelf assembly.

shelfFanTraySerialNumber.name: shelfFanTraySerialNumber
shelfFanTraySerialNumber.description: The manufacturing serial number for the fan tray assembly in this shelf assembly.

shelfFanTrayRevisionCode.name: shelfFanTrayRevisionCode
shelfFanTrayRevisionCode.description: The hardware revision code for the fan tray assembly in this shelf assembly.

shelfSlotCount.name: shelfSlotCount
shelfSlotCount.description: The number of slots in this shelf

shelfFeatureBits.name: shelfFeatureBits
shelfFeatureBits.description: A string of 8 octets indicating the setting of the feature BITS.

shelfIOAlarmBoardPresent.name: shelfIOAlarmBoardPresent
shelfIOAlarmBoardPresent.description: Indicates that MXK I/O Alarm Board hardware is present and supported. Not used in systems other than MXK.

shelfStatusTable.name: shelfStatusTable
shelfStatusTable.description: environmental status table - this table contains the environmental monitoring data for each shelf in a PLS.

shelfStatusEntry.name: shelfStatusEntry
shelfStatusEntry.description: This table augments the shelfDataTable. Each entry in the table contains the status of the environmental monitoring sensors on the shelf monitor card.

shelfAPowerStatus.name: shelfAPowerStatus
shelfAPowerStatus.description: Status of the A power to the shelf. On systems with multiple power sources, this entry represents the AC power-supply status. On systems with line-power, this entry represents the status of power-line 1. The status of the power is indicated as follows: powerOk: the shelf is receiving a normal (in-range) voltage. powerNotOk: the shelf is not receiving voltage or the voltage is outside of the usable range. A trap is generated with the loss of A power.

shelfBPowerStatus.name: shelfBPowerStatus
shelfBPowerStatus.description: Status of the B power to the shelf. On systems with multiple power sources, this entry represents the -48 Volt DC power-supply status. On systems with line-power, this entry represents the status of power-line 2. The status of the power is indicated as follows: powerOk: the shelf is receiving a normal (in-range) voltage. powerNotOk: the shelf is not receiving voltage or the voltage is outside of the usable range. A trap is generated with the loss of A power.

shelfTemperatureStatus.name: shelfTemperatureStatus
shelfTemperatureStatus.description: Outlet or exhaust air temperature as status. A trap is generated if temperature leaves the normal opertioning range.

shelfFanTrayStatus.name: shelfFanTrayStatus
shelfFanTrayStatus.description: The operational status of the shelf fan tray assembly as follows: Operational: the fan tray is fully operational with all fans running. notOperational: the fan tray assembly has failed. A high severity trap is generated when the status is set to notOperational.

shelfAlarmContactsStatus.name: shelfAlarmContactsStatus
shelfAlarmContactsStatus.description: A BIT field of two (2) BITs indicating larm status of the dry contact alarm on the chassis/shelf: A value of zero(0) is returned in each BIT if the contact is open A value of one(1) is returned if the contack is closed

shelfCardStatus.name: shelfCardStatus
shelfCardStatus.description: A string of octets, with one octet per card slot on the shelf assembly. The string of octets indicates the status of each slot in sequence with the first octet describing first slot. The encoding of each octet is as follows: 1: card is booting from eeprom 2: card is performing post tests 3: card is loading code from code loader 4: card is configuing 5: card is running 6: card is blocked from booting 7: card is dumping fatal data 8: card is in faulted 9: card is reseting 10: slot is empty 11: slot is not provisioned 12: card is disabled 13: card is powered down 14: card is powered up 15: card is uplink with active traffic 16: card is uplink without active traffic

shelfLedStatus.name: shelfLedStatus
shelfLedStatus.description: A BIT field of six(6) BITs indicating the status of the LEDs on the chassis bezel. A value of zero(0) is returned in each BIT if the LED is off, a value of one(1) is returned if the LED is lit.

shelfAdminResets.name: shelfAdminResets
shelfAdminResets.description: Count of the number of administration resets to a shelf such as systemreboot.

shelfFaultResets.name: shelfFaultResets
shelfFaultResets.description: Count of the number of shelf resets due to faults.

shelfPowerResets.name: shelfPowerResets
shelfPowerResets.description: Count of the number of shelf resets due to power failure or power cycle.

shelfCPowerStatus.name: shelfCPowerStatus
shelfCPowerStatus.description: Status of the C power to the shelf. On systems with multiple power sources, this entry represents the line-power power-supply status. On systems with line-power, this entry represents the status of power-line 3. The status of the power is indicated as follows: powerOk: the shelf is receiving a normal (in-range) voltage. powerNotOk: the shelf is not receiving voltage or the voltage is outside of the usable range. A trap is generated with the loss of A power.

shelfDPowerStatus.name: shelfDPowerStatus
shelfDPowerStatus.description: Status of the D power to the shelf. On systems with line-power, this entry represents the status of power-line 4. The status of the power is indicated as follows: powerOk: the shelf is receiving a normal (in-range) voltage. powerNotOk: the shelf is not receiving voltage or the voltage is outside of the usable range. A trap is generated with the loss of A power.

shelfFanTable.name: shelfFanTable
shelfFanTable.description: A table of information about the fans on the shelf. Currently a BAN has 8 fans and a MALC has 3 fans.

shelfFanIndex.name: shelfFanIndex
shelfFanIndex.description: An index into the fan table. It is index from 1..Number of fans with no missing indicies.

shelfFanSpeed.name: shelfFanSpeed
shelfFanSpeed.description: Fan speed of the fan in RPM

shelfFanLocation.name: shelfFanLocation
shelfFanLocation.description: Description of the location of the fan in the fan tray

shelfFanLowSpeedThreshold.name: shelfFanLowSpeedThreshold
shelfFanLowSpeedThreshold.description: The lower speed allowed for a fan before it is considered failed.

shelfTemperatureTable.name: shelfTemperatureTable
shelfTemperatureTable.description: A table of information about the temperature sensors in the shelf.

shelfTemperatureIndex.name: shelfTemperatureIndex
shelfTemperatureIndex.description: An index into the temperature table. It is index 1..Number of temperature sensors with no missing indicies.

shelfTemperature.name: shelfTemperature
shelfTemperature.description: The temperature of a shelf at this position.

shelfTemperatureLocation.name: shelfTemperatureLocation
shelfTemperatureLocation.description: The location of the this temperature sensors.

shelfTemperatureHighThreshold.name: shelfTemperatureHighThreshold
shelfTemperatureHighThreshold.description: The upper temperature when an alarm will be sent.

shelfTemperatureLowThreshold.name: shelfTemperatureLowThreshold
shelfTemperatureLowThreshold.description: The lower temperature that an alarm will be sent.

shelfCardTable.name: shelfCardTable
shelfCardTable.description: A table of card information for each shelf in a PLS system. The includes different counts of resets for each card and the card type for each slot.

shelfCardEntry.name: shelfCardEntry
shelfCardEntry.description: An entry per slot and shelf in a PLS system. The entries are indexed by zhoneShelfIndex/zhoneSlotIndex.

cardType.name: cardType
cardType.description: The card type for the card in this slot.

cardSubType.name: cardSubType
cardSubType.description: The card sub type for this slot

cardLineType.name: cardLineType
cardLineType.description: The card line type for this slot. This is only valid if the slot is provisioned.

cardVersion.name: cardVersion
cardVersion.description: The card version for the card in this slot.

cardEepromVersion.name: cardEepromVersion
cardEepromVersion.description: The eeprom version for the card in this slot.

cardSerialNumber.name: cardSerialNumber
cardSerialNumber.description: The serial number for the card in this slot.

cardCLEICode.name: cardCLEICode
cardCLEICode.description: CLEI (Common Language Equipment Identifier) code of the shelf assembly as stored in the EEPROM of the unit if defined otherwise the value will be set to NULL (0-length string) by the shelf monitor card.

cardFeatureBits.name: cardFeatureBits
cardFeatureBits.description: A string of 8 octets indicating the setting of the feature BITS.

cardState.name: cardState
cardState.description: The card state for the card in this slot. cardStateBooting card is booting from eeprom cardStatePost card is performing post tests cardStateLoading card is loading code from code loader cardStateConfiguring card is configuing cardStateRunning card is running cardStateResetHold card is blocked from booting cardStateDumping cardStateFault card is in faulted cardStateReset card is reseting cardNotPresent card is not present in slot cardNotProvisioned card in slot is not provisioned

cardAdminResets.name: cardAdminResets
cardAdminResets.description: Count of the number of administration resets to this card.

cardFaultResets.name: cardFaultResets
cardFaultResets.description: Count of number of fault resets to this card.

cardReboot.name: cardReboot
cardReboot.description: When set to true, this card will be rebooted. Error cases: (a) If the card is not present, a set results in an INCONSISTENT_VALUE error. (b) An attempt to set to false results in a WRONG_VALUE error. All gets will return a value of false. This is supported only on systems with a supervisory bus, such as BAN & MALC.

zhoneShelfStatus.name: zhoneShelfStatus
zhoneShelfStatus.description: This variable is set by the ShelfMonitor when the shelf state changes.

zhoneCardStatus.name: zhoneCardStatus
zhoneCardStatus.description: This variable is set by the ShelfMonitor whenever the card state changes.

zhoneShelfStatusLastChange.name: zhoneShelfStatusLastChange
zhoneShelfStatusLastChange.description: The time the shelf status changed.

zhoneCardStatusLastChange.name: zhoneCardStatusLastChange
zhoneCardStatusLastChange.description: The time the card status last changed.

zhoneTrapShelfStatusChange.name: zhoneTrapShelfStatusChange
zhoneTrapShelfStatusChange.description: Shelf status reported by the ShelfMonitor.

zhoneTrapCardStatusChange.name: zhoneTrapCardStatusChange
zhoneTrapCardStatusChange.description: Card status reported by the ShelfMonitor.

zhoneTrapCardVersionCheck.name: zhoneTrapCardVersionCheck
zhoneTrapCardVersionCheck.description: When the cardVersion of a card is incompatible with that of active InfoServ card, this trap is generated. Currently, this is only supported on BAN platform and its card versions are described as follows: The revision number of the newer 40 Mhz cards is in the range of 'BA' to 'CV'. Older card version either does not display in this format or the revision number is not in this range. For example, for a card with cardVersion '840-29496-72-CR', the revision number is 'CR' and is a new 40 Mhz card.

zhoneTrapFlashCardStatusChange.name: zhoneTrapFlashCardStatusChange
zhoneTrapFlashCardStatusChange.description: This Trap reports the FlashCard status change for the InfoServ slots flash cards within BAN shelf.

zhoneTrapCardToBkplaneStatusChange.name: zhoneTrapCardToBkplaneStatusChange
zhoneTrapCardToBkplaneStatusChange.description: Mxk line card link to backplane status.

zhoneShelfStatusGroup.name: zhoneShelfStatusGroup
zhoneShelfStatusGroup.description: These objects are used to identify the status change of the trap.

zhoneFlashCardStatusChange.name: zhoneFlashCardStatusChange
zhoneFlashCardStatusChange.description: The FlashCardStatus reports the status of the flash card ports on the InfoServe cards within BAN shelf. 1 : FlashCard Port 1 is Installed 2 : FlashCard Port 1 is Removed 3 : FlashCard Port 2 is Installed 4 : FlashCard Port 2 is Removed

zhoneCardLinkToBkplaneStatus.name: zhoneCardLinkToBkplaneStatus
zhoneCardLinkToBkplaneStatus.description: Mxk linecard Link To Backplane status.
